title: Handle a Bird Strike on Takeoff
description: Shortly after takeoff, a flight experiences a bird strike on one of its engines. The crew must assess the situation and take appropriate action.

tasks.description: The pilots monitor the engine instruments for any signs of damage or power loss.
tasks.expected_outcome: The instruments indicate a slight vibration but no loss of thrust.

tasks.description: The crew follows the checklist for a bird strike.
As a precaution, the pilot informs ATC of the event and decides to return to the departure airport for an inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pilot makes a safe decision to return and land.
